lenders.name: Ramon
lenders.occupational_info:
I am working as an Account Manager (small business) for the Rabobank
Key Accountabilities / Activities:
To relationship manage a portfolio of small business customers by meeting the total banking needs of the customer, both personal and business. The portfolio will primarily contain small business customers whose business needs are generally straightforward. Typical small businesses managed at this level would include: small to medium sized agriculture operations; small to medium sized franchises; businesses with one or two locations; many professionals and small trades. Meet the personal needs of these small business customers, which may range from simple to complex, by profiling, referring, promoting, selling, cross-selling, up selling and delivering a full range of personal banking products and services, including several sophisticated products.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs someone to help them realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Clare Broome
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to set a good example for my son, helping him to see no matter how little we have, we still have to ability to help make life a little better for other people just like us across the world
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work helping other lone parents across Europe to overcome the barriers they face, both internally and externally, and to make a better life for themselves and their children. In the past I've done lots of different jobs from cleaning toilets to teaching English to selling wedding dresses and I've just set up my own business as a Fine Art Model - quite a change from my last job! My most important job however will always be raising my son - he's a great kid and I am very proud of him.

I am loaning funds to assist women in their endeavours to support themselves  and their families. I want to donate in the name of an angelic child ....Aleena.

They have a strong and capable Mother that will lead by her amazing example. She will learn much from her and Mom from both her daughters!!!

I am a lettercarrier delivering the Nation's mail in all kinds of environmental conditions.

Additionally, I believe in acting justly and loving mercy.  Micro-lending fits into both.

it is the right thing to do &
